title: Rockets Drama, Lakers Going All In, Don't Bury The Celtics, and Kevin Durant
itunes:title: Rockets Drama, Lakers Going All In, Don't Bury The Celtics, and Kevin Durant
description:
Doug Gottlieb, in for Colin Cowherd, discusses the rumors of dysfunction in the Rockets organization and where the team goes moving forward. Doug says that the Lakers going all in makes sense. He explains why people shouldn't dance on the Celtics grave. And Doug tells you why he isn't buying Kevin Durant to New York.

Guests Include: Chris Mannix, Brian Smith and Jason McIntyre

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
